blogPost.excerpt: With our easy 1-step setup process, you can analyse the results of all your email marketing campaigns and truly understand which clicks are hot, which clicks are not and the areas that get the most clicks.
blogPost.body: With our easy 1-step setup process, you can analyse the results of all your email marketing campaigns and truly understand which clicks are hot, which clicks are not and the areas that get the most clicks.
blogPost.title: Email Heatmaps - Create heatmaps for all your email marketing campaigns
blogPost.author: Taylor Drayson

localize.description: 通过我们简单的1步设置过程，您可以分析所有电子邮件营销活动的结果，并真正了解哪些点击是热门的，哪些点击不是，以及获得最多点击的领域。
localize.tagline: 为您的所有电子邮件营销活动创建热图。

localize.description: 通過我們簡單的1步設置過程，您可以分析所有電子郵件營銷活動的結果，並真正瞭解哪些點擊是熱門的，哪些點擊不是，以及獲得最多點擊的領域。
localize.tagline: 爲您的所有電子郵件營銷活動創建熱圖。

localize.description: 在您的React Native应用中进行A/B测试和功能管理。通过Taplytics React Native SDK，让您的团队可以灵活地进行实验和推出新功能。
